mapper.insert: insert into gathering (gathering_id, writer_id, post_date, title, description, gathering_date, maxpeople, attendsystem, note, question, address1, address2, address3, place_name, lat, lng) values (gathering_id_seq.nextval,'kim123',sysdate,#{title},#{description},#{gathering_date}, #{maxPeople},#{attendSystem},#{note},#{question}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{place_name}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.select:
select gathering_id, writer_id, post_date, title, gathering_date, address1, address2, place_name, maxpeople, view_count from gathering where
1=1 and
address1 like #{address1}||'%' and
gathering_date > (sysdate+(3/24))
order by gathering_id desc
